EmailTemplate.name: August-September Digests 2017.Cloud-Native/Data Invite 8-1-17 TEXT
EmailTemplate.subject: 8/15 How to Operationalize IoT Apps on Pivotal Cloud Foundry Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join Pivotal Data Scientist Chris Rawles, as he illustrates how to build and operationalize an Internet of Things (IoT) application running on Pivotal Cloud Foundry, that scores and reacts to streaming data in real-time. In this webinar you will learn how to:
- Collect streaming IoT data - Build and train machine learning models in real-time - Score streaming data in real-time in an application
Date: Tuesday, August 15, 2017
Time: 11:00am PDT / 2:00pm EDT
ATTEND <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/aug-15-learn-how-to-operationalize-iot-apps-on-pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-social&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign=operationalize-iot-apps-jk-q317]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us.
The Pivotal Team
